fullplot: A series of murders leads commander TRUJILLO to Santa Rosa de la Sal a town close to a salt mine, where he meets VèCTOR ZEPEDA - a lonely teenager who works in his father funeral home and spends his free time making crude animated horror films - who's strange behavior seems to point at him as the culprit of the crimes.
